class  pp::VpnProvider
 The VpnProvider class enhances the chrome.vpnProvider JavaScript API by providing a high performance path for packet handling. More...

Namespaces

namespace  pp

Detailed Description

This file defines the VpnProvider interface providing a way to implement a VPN client.

Important: This API is available only on ChromeOS.
